text: IceWeasel can refer to: *Debian Iceweasel, a web browser that is part of Mozilla Corporation software rebranded by the Debian project *GNU IceCat, a web browser formerly known as GNU IceWeasel *Stoat (Mustela erminea), also known as the ermine or short-tailed weasel, which appears white in its winter coat
title: IceWeasel (disambiguation)
